overview.currentRole: Level 2 Technical Support Manager at Vodafone

keyAchievements: Reduced customer churn by 25% through Customer Success Program
Implemented automation tools reducing manual ticket handling by 50%
Led network upgrades spanning 148 global sites with minimal disruption
Achieved 99.95% SLA adherence in technical support
Decreased ticket volume by 70% through proactive monitoring
Spearheaded Service Improvement Plan (SIP) for major clients, improving service uptime by 50%
Launched proactive network monitoring system, reducing unplanned outages by 70%
Managed vulnerability management processes ensuring secure network infrastructure

professionalExperience.title: Level 2 Technical Support Manager
highlights: Lead a team of 8 technical support engineers providing 24/7 managed services support to enterprise clients
Implement and manage Service Level Agreements (SLAs)
Act as the primary point of contact for high-value customers
Streamlined incident management processes using ITIL frameworks, improving resolution times and customer satisfaction
Initiated a Customer Support Task Force reducing ticket volume by 70%

professionalExperience.title: Level 2 Technical Operations Manager
highlights: Led a team of 8 L3 network engineers, developing network security protocols
Managed 4 data centers and ensured continuous network operation
Successfully project managed vulnerability management process and enterprise server builds

professionalExperience.title: Network Manager
highlights: Led a team of network engineers overseeing design, deployment, and support of the network infrastructure
Managed OPEX and CAPEX budgets of over 10 million Euros
Project-managed technology upgrades and capacity optimization to meet customer demands

professionalExperience.title: Network Manager
highlights: Led global network operations team responsible for LAN, WAN, and firewall infrastructure
Managed network upgrades, including WAN upgrades from 1G to 10G/100G
Spearheaded deployment of IPv6 and IP management solutions

professionalExperience.title: Network Development Manager
highlights: Managed a team of 12 DevOps engineers delivering network infrastructure support through automation
Drove operational excellence and developed innovative tools for network efficiency
Created performance assessments and managed escalation incidents

professionalExperience.title: Network Operations Manager
highlights: Managed NOC operations and a team of 27 engineers across Africa and Europe
Oversaw network planning, design, and incident management processes
Supported procurement and managed vendor services

professionalExperience.title: Technical Support Engineer
highlights: Designed and maintained distributed networks using MPLS and other routing protocols
Provided technical support for submarine fibre cables and company infrastructure

professionalExperience.title: Senior Network Engineer
highlights: Designed, deployed, and managed core network infrastructure
Managed IP core networks supporting WiMAX, 2G/3G/4G, and fiber-optic services

professionalExperience.title: Network Operation Centre Technician
highlights: Monitored and managed network equipment and systems in the NOC
Performed network health checks and managed trouble tickets

professionalExperience.title: Customer Service Engineer
highlights: Maintained high levels of customer satisfaction through SLA management
Led service reviews and coordinated troubleshooting efforts

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
